584120.name: Splasher - Official Soundtrack
584120.description:
The Original Soundtrack for Splasher!

Tracklist


  • 01 - Employees Only - David Boitier
  • 02 - Capture - David Boitier
  • 03 - Dubby Surf - David Boitier
  • 04 - Rubber Glop - David Boitier
  • 05 - Inkorp Frenzy - David Boitier
  • 06 - The Hourglass - David Boitier
  • 07 - Gritty Bitty - David Boitier
  • 08 - Epic Flood - David Boitier
  • 09 - Painted Soul - Aymeric Schwartz
  • 10 - LED Lullaby - David Boitier
  • 11 - Bastion - David Boitier
  • 12 - She Nods - David Boitier
  • 13 - Theme Hard - David Boitier
  • 14 - The Oktopus - Aymeric Schwartz
  • 15 - Liquid Assault - Aymeric Schwartz
  • 16 - Pinball Clock - David Boitier

The Soundtrack will be available in the following Steam Directory: …Steam\SteamApps\common\Splasher[/i]
